entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:41 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -20.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 9:49 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -20.2°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -23.0°C
Wind: E 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
